segments.text: Watching the boy lean over that jar sends a wave of panic through me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What’s going to happen if he loses his balance? I can already envision him tumbling to the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I see the girl, her arm raised in eager expectation, and it’s just so innocent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their playful energy makes me smile even as I worry for their safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a strange dichotomy—the joy of childhood mixed with the potential for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult in the scene, drying dishes, remains blissfully unaware, which feels infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she could see what I see, the beauty and danger of their little act unfolding right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR
